record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="application" and term="Application attributes table" and format.name="application" and syslanguage="en"
record.recordid: application - Application attributes table - application - en
record.file.name: application
record.format.name: application

brief.brief: Contains one record for each application.
The attribute tables contain data specific to a particular type of device.

If an attribute table exists for a device type, then each device record for that device type will have a corresponding attribute record in the device type's attribute table. For example, a switch attribute record might identify the maximum number of ports a switch can support and a modem attribute record would identify baud rate.
